mapper.select: SELECT reservation.*,maininfo.rno,maininfo.rname FROM reservation,maininfo WHERE reservation.userid=#{userid} AND maininfo.rno=reservation.rno ORDER BY resDate DESC

SELECT rno,rno1,cno,cprice,cstartdate,cenddate,cname,rname,userid, num FROM(SELECT rno,rno1,cno,cprice,cstartdate,cenddate,cname,rname,userid, rownum as num FROM ( SELECT coupon.rno as rno, maininfo.rno as rno1,cno,cprice,cstartdate,cenddate,cname,rname,userid FROM coupon,maininfo WHERE maininfo.rno=coupon.rno AND userid=#{userid})) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT rno,rno1,cno,cprice,cstartdate,cenddate,cname,rname,userid, num FROM(SELECT rno,rno1,cno,cprice,cstartdate,cenddate,cname,rname,userid, rownum as num FROM ( SELECT coupon.rno as rno, maininfo.rno as rno1,cno,cprice,cstartdate,cenddate,cname,rname,userid FROM coupon,maininfo WHERE maininfo.rno=coupon.rno AND userid=#{userid} AND rname LIKE '%' || #{rname}||'%')) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT DISTINCT rname FROM(SELECT rno,rno1,cno,cprice,cstartdate,cenddate,cname,rname,userid, rownum as num FROM ( SELECT coupon.rno as rno, maininfo.rno as rno1,cno,cprice,cstartdate,cenddate,cname,rname,userid FROM coupon,maininfo WHERE maininfo.rno=coupon.rno AND userid=#{userid} AND rname LIKE '%' || #{rname}||'%' )) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT rno,rno1,revno,userid,revscore,revcontent,revdate,revgood,revbad,rname, num FROM(SELECT rno,rno1,revno,userid,revscore,revcontent,revdate,revgood,revbad,rname, rownum as num FROM ( SELECT review.rno as rno,maininfo.rno as rno1,revno,userid,revscore,revcontent,revdate,revgood,revbad,rname FROM review,maininfo WHERE maininfo.rno=review.rno AND userid=#{userid})) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT rno,rname,rscore,rtel,raddr1,iname,ilink,userid,regdate, num FROM(SELECT rno,rno2,rname,rscore,rtel,raddr1,iname,ilink,userid,regdate, rownum as num FROM(SELECT mywish.rno as rno,maininfo.rno as rno1,image.rno as rno2,rname,rscore,rtel,raddr1,iname,ilink,userid,regdate FROM mywish,maininfo,image WHERE maininfo.rno=mywish.rno AND mywish.rno=image.rno AND userid=#{userid} AND iname='Mainimage')) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
